scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w apps/admin-api" "npm run dev -w apps/admin-web"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w apps/admin-api" "npm run dev -w apps/admin-web"
scripts.dev:game: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/admin-api && npm run build -w apps/admin-web
scripts.build:game: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/admin-api && npm run test -w packages/shared
scripts.test:game: npm run test -w shared && npm run test -w server
